scripts.start: docker compose up -d server web db && npm run logs
scripts.start:test: docker compose up -d server-test web-test nv-mock db
scripts.stop:test: docker compose down server-test web-test nv-mock
scripts.recycle: npm stop && npm run build && npm start
scripts.logs:test: docker compose logs -f server-test web-test nv-mock
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm ci && cd ../web && npm ci && cd ../e2e && npm ci
scripts.e2e:open: npm run start:test && cd e2e && npm start
scripts.e2e: npm run start:test && npm run wait-for-server && cd e2e && npm test
scripts.test: npm run unit-tests && npm run e2e
scripts.prune: docker compose down && docker volume rm keijo-local_keijo-pg
